snippet.title: Marvel Heroes Omega - Open Beta Launch Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/marvel-heroes-omega-ps4/

The wait is finally over! Marvel Heroes Omega assembles one of the largest gatherings of iconic Super Heroes, Villains, and locations from the Marvel Universe in gaming history for its PlayStation 4 Open Beta launch on May 23, 2017.

Download now from the PlayStation Store FOR FREE! 

http://www.marvelheroes.com/

Band together with fellow adventurers, take the fight to Doctor Doom in an epic nine-chapter story campaign, and experience your favorite Heroes, including Captain America, Iron Man, Spider-Man, Wolverine, Deadpool, and more! 

© 2017 MARVEL. © 2017 GAZILLION, INC. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
